Text.Value: ...I will do it, Overseer. Forgive me.

EditorData.NodeContext: first line to guard, second line looking at player. Heartbroken, about to attack player.

Text.Value: Overseer, please - we are engineers, not killers...

EditorData.NodeContext: Overseer has just asked her to cut out someone's eyes. Scared, horrified

Text.Value: I am here to help, Gondians. Together, we can free you all.
What happens to the disobedient, slave?
It matters not - you revealed yourself for nothing. The Gondians wouldn't know a spine if I ripped it from their backs and beat them with it.

EditorData.NodeContext: dismissive wave of her hand, speaking about the gondians as if they weren't right next to her

Text.Value: A proposal, Gondians. You hold these arseholes, and I stab them all to death?
I've heard many a tale of Gondian genius and courage. Let us write another today - and take down your captors.
Say nothing.
I said - we shall bow no more! For the glory of Gond!

EditorData.NodeContext: raises her fist in the air, yelling a battle cry for her fellow gondians to attack - and take back their freedom

Text.Value: I wish to bathe in the blood of these worthless Banites. You can help, Gondians - or you can die.
In the presence of company, it is rude not to announce yourself, dear visitor. I neither know nor care how you got in here - but you shall not leave.
An interloper? How did you get in here?

EditorData.NodeContext: as close to shocked as a banite gets  - speaking to player, angry that the player managed to get into the steel foundry - somewhere that is  supposed to impenetrable

Text.Value: You're wrong. Even if we beg, even if we humiliate ourselves, it won't matter. You'll kill us all anyway.

EditorData.NodeContext: this is the moment - curles fist, realising the only way she'll survive is if she fights back. Speaking almost to herself.

Text.Value: Here - take this Motivator. Be careful - this one's trigger is sensitive. If you drop it, it's likely to incinerate them all.

EditorData.NodeContext: generic handing motion to player. Pride as she discusses the cruel device

Text.Value: Touch these people, and I'll kill you.
Forgive the interruption, Dread Sister. I've just arrived for duty.
Dread Brother - stand ready. Gondians - so much as twitch, and I'll rip your tongues out myself.

EditorData.NodeContext: she hears a noise (the player has just arrived, turns to face the player. Cold, cruel and calm. She doesn't know who they are, yet she is prepared to strike them down

Text.Value: *You recognise the Overseer's uniform. She's a follower of Bane - the god of tyranny.*
You speak words of command, yet your voice quivers. You are no follower of the Black Hand.

EditorData.NodeContext: cold, cruel smile as she catches the player - speaking to player

Text.Value: I am here to help, Gondians. Together, we can free you all.
Cowardly Gondians - do not let these people torment you! Fight.
COWARDLY GONDIANS - FIGHT BACK! FIGHT WITH ME!
Gondians! Fight back! Do not let these people torment you.
Gondians, cut out the interloper's eyes.

EditorData.NodeContext: dismissive wave of the hand towards the player, like they were turd they found on the floor. Speaks to Lowa in the second line

Text.Value: An interloper? You shouldn't be here - heads will roll for allowing you to pass.

EditorData.NodeContext: as close to shocked as a banite gets  - speaking to player, angry that the player managed to get into the steel foundry - somewhere that is  supposed to impenetrable

Text.Value: What was that?

EditorData.NodeContext: surprise, shock that the gondian would dare speak back - said to lowa

Text.Value: The relief crew was due hours past. Your tardiness will be noted, Dread Sister.
The relief crew was due hours past. Your tardiness will be noted, Dread Brother.
The relief crew was due hours past. Your tardiness will be noted, Dread One.
I hope Lord Gortash gives the signal soon. I'm getting tired of their whining.

Synopsis: The player is caught walking around the workroom by some baneites. The player can try to act like they are baneites, or rile up the Gondians into a rebellion. High tension, high stakes situation.
